task_text: Which of my projects doesn't have somebody responsible for the quality assurance on the team?

text_blocks: Now I need to find all projects you're involved in and check which ones don't have a QA role on the team.

project.name: Zinc-rich primer trial for fabrication line
project.description: Trial of zinc-rich primer system for regional fabricated steel structures.

text_blocks:
I found your project. Let me check if there's a QA role on the team. Looking at the project "Zinc-rich primer trial for fabrication line", the team consists of:
- You (Bhwa_010) as Lead
- Bhwa_044 as Engineer

There is no QA (Quality Assurance) role on this team.

input.message:
You have one project that is missing a Quality Assurance (QA) role:

**Zinc-rich primer trial for fabrication line** (Status: exploring)
- Customer: BalkanMetal Fabrication
- Current team: Lead + Engineer (no QA)

This project currently has no one responsible for quality assurance on the team.
